# tf.sysconfig.get_link_flags


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r2.0/tensorflow/python/platform/sysconfig.py#L70-L86">

Get the link flags for custom operators.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.sysconfig.get_link_flags`
* `tf.compat.v2.sysconfig.get_link_flags`


``` python
tf.sysconfig.get_link_flags()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

The link flags.
